message_1:
A delivery truck needs to transport supplies to 5 stores that are all located in different parts of the city. The distance between each store is given in the table below:

| Store |   A   |   B   |   C   |   D   |   E   |
|-------|-------|-------|-------|-------|-------|
| A     |   0   |   9   |   7   |  12   |   6   |
| B     |   9   |   0   |   8   |  10   |  11  |
| C     |   7   |   8   |   0   |   6   |   5   |
| D     |  12  |  10  |   6   |   0   |   7   |
| E     |   6   |  11  |   5   |   7   |   0   |

The truck has to start and end at Store A. What is the optimal route the truck should take to minimize the total distance traveled?
message_2:
